description:
Hiochi bacteria, sake`s worst enemy, are pouring out of the window of a school building! Sawaki traces them to a room where two upperclassmen, Kawahama and Misato, are illicitly brewing sake. Now deep in debt after their sake brewing effort failed, the pair devise a plan to make money using Sawaki`s ability to see microbes...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: San Oku En no Noudai Sei
